title: Earthlings WeWow Day 4: Hello World!
description:
Mindy, Guy Raz and Thomas Fingerling are on the road in the Wow on Wheels for Day 4 of Earthlings WeWow! And today, they're thinking and tinkering like... aliens!! Now it's your turn, how would you describe the WOWs of this world if you were from OUT of this world! Give us a call at 1-888-7WOW-WOW with how you'd describe the world looking with a new set of eyes. And come back tomorrow to meet aliens Flip and Mozi from the new Tinkercast Original podcast, who really are experiencing Earth for the first time!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
